channel.title: Comments on: The Standing Desk
channel.description: A Technical Community for IT Professionals

item.title: By: Brian Genchur
item.dc:creator: Brian Genchur
item.description: We're thrilled that you're enjoying your new desk, Jes. Remember that we're always here to help! Just send us an e-mail at info@thehumansolution.com, or call us 1 (800) 531-3746.
item.content:encoded: We’re thrilled that you’re enjoying your new desk, Jes. Remember that we’re always here to help! Just send us an e-mail at info@thehumansolution.com, or call us 1 (800) 531-3746.

item.title: By: Eli Weinstock-Herman (tarwn)
item.dc:creator: Eli Weinstock-Herman (tarwn)
item.description: Very nice! I have a bamboo top on mine and I really like it. My work one is laminate and the bamboo definitely feels like a step up.
item.content:encoded: Very nice! I have a bamboo top on mine and I really like it. My work one is laminate and the bamboo definitely feels like a step up.
